ProductInfo.Features:
GW9716LGH-F: 16 CH H.264 video compression format; support 960H&D1; resolution; HDMI output for better resolution; New GUI; PTZ Control; Multiple operation modes; USB2.0 backup, upgrade and mouse operation
GW40WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera 700 TVL 2.8~12mm Varifocal Lens 66 IR LEDs 196 ft. IR Distance WDR(Wide Dynamic Range) OSD Menu. Vandal proof water proof
GW108M: Professional 1/3" Effio CCD Camera 700 TVL 2.8~12mm Varifocal Lens 36pcs IR LED 98 ft. IR Distance Vandal proof WDR(Wide Dynamic Range) OSD Menu.
Package Includes: GW9716LGH-F DVR with 4T HD; GWLED19IN: Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 8 x GW40WD: 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera; 8 x GW108M: 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera
Package Includes: 1xGW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x GW082:Power pigtail; 16 x GW132: Power pigtail; 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
